Shopify Hero Parallax Section

Learn how to create a Hero Parallax section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Hero Parallax section is a dynamic and visually appealing feature that allows you to create a hero section with a parallax effect for your Shopify store. This section is perfect for capturing visitors' attention with a stunning background image, captivating texts, and call-to-action buttons. The parallax scrolling effect adds depth and movement, enriching the user experience and making your store stand out.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Hero Parallax"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Seasonal Promotions: Highlight your seasonal sales and promotions with engaging headlines and attractive call-to-action buttons.
  2. New Arrivals: Showcase your latest products with high-quality images and enticing descriptions.
  3. Customer Testimonials: Add five-star customer reviews and feedback to build trust and credibility.
  4. Brand Storytelling: Use the section to tell your brand story with rich text blocks and images.
  5. Event Announcements: Promote upcoming events or launches with a captivating hero section.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

Font Settings

  • Override theme fonts: Option to use custom fonts instead of the theme's default fonts.
  • Headline Font: Select the font family, size, and weight for headlines.
  • Text Font: Select the font family, size, and weight for body text.

Text Settings

  • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text in pixels.
  • Text Line Height: Choose the line height for text, with preset options or inherit from the theme.
  • Text Color: Set the color of the text.
  • Headline Size: Adjust the size of the headlines in pixels.
  • Headline Line Height: Choose the line height for headlines, with preset options or inherit from the theme.
  • Headline Color: Set the color of the headlines.
  • Subtle Shadow on Text: Toggle to add a shadow effect to the text for better readability.

Color Settings

  • Background: Select a background color or gradient for the section.
  • Cover Background: Select a cover background color or gradient.
  • Cover Opacity: Adjust the opacity of the cover background in percentage.

Image Settings

  • Image: Upload a background image for the hero section.

Alignment Settings

  • Box Alignment: Adjust the alignment of the content box (left, center, right).

Dimension Settings

  • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width of the section in pixels.
  • Height of Section: Set the height of the section in pixels.
  • Padding: Adjust the padding around the content (top, bottom, left, right) in pixels.
  • Spacing between Elements: Set the spacing between different elements in the section in pixels.

Block Types

  • @app: Custom app block.
  • Headline: Text alignment and content for headlines.
  • Paragraph: Text alignment and content for paragraphs.
  • Rich Text: Text alignment and content, including HTML for rich text elements.
  • Button: Button alignment, style, and text settings, including background color, text color, text size, padding, and border radius.
  • 5 Star: Star rating icon alignment and color.

These settings and customization options allow you to tailor the Hero Parallax section to match your brand's style and enhance the shopping experience on your Shopify store.
